function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of industrial robots may lead to higher risk of disease transmission if not properly managed.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among workers and potentially surrounding communities.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular sanitization of robots, and maintaining physical distancing in robot-operated areas.","Technologies":"Robotic automation with self-cleaning features, IoT-enabled monitoring for distancing compliance.","People":"Factory workers, employees in robot-operated industries, surrounding communities.","Owner":"Factory owners, industrial robotics companies, government authorities."}]}
